mean_cn: n.竞技场，圆形露天剧场，古罗马剧场
mean_en: a large building with seats rising in curved rows around an open space on which games and plays take place
sentence: The Romans built many amphitheaters for plays and public performances.
sentence_trans: 罗马人修建了许多露天剧院，用来看剧和公开表演。
word_etyma: amphi两双 ＋ theat戏院 ＋ er表示物 → 两个半圆围起来的戏院 → amphitheater竞技场；[建]圆形露天剧场
